about_the_game:
Are you ready to survive in a zombie apocalypse world with your friends? Virus is spreading in the open world
and undead zombies are everywhere. Now you need to use all your survival and shooting skills to stop them! Prepare yourself for FPS game - Craft & Survive.

Craft & Survive is a FPS zombie action game where you need to combine your crafting and shooting skills.
The Apocalypse has just begun and you need to stop the spreading virus by defeating zombies all over the planet.

▶ FEATURES

- Different type of weapons
- Craft and Construction System
- Sniper mode
- Surviving system
- Construction mode
- Construction Mode
- Open world with tones of Zombies
- And more...

Join with your friends now in Craft & Survive

content_descriptors.notes: This contain violence and graphic blood elements
